All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Appointment
This class is an object constructor used to create appointment objects in the database and get/set their values.
AppointmentsController
This is the controller to display and do the CRUD functions on the appointments.
Contact
This class is an object constructor used to create contact objects in the database and get/set their values.
Country
This class is an object constructor used to create country objects in the database and get/set their values.
CreateAppointmentsController
Create Appointment Controller
CreateCustomersController
This is the Customers creation Controller
Customer
This class is an object constructor used to create customer objects in the database and get/set their values.
CustomersController
Customers Controller for Viewing and Manipulating Customers in the database.
DBAppointments
This class is the SQL connection to the appointments table that does the data CRUD stuff.
DBConnection
This class creates and closes the connection to a MySQL Database of the user's choice by changing the variable parameters.
DBContacts
This class is the SQL connection to the contacts table for data retrieval.
DBCountry
This class is the SQL connection to the countries table for data retrieval.
DBCustomers
This class is the SQL connection to the customers table that does the data CRUD stuff.
DBDivision
This class is the SQL connection to the first_level_divisions table for data retrieval.
DBQuery
This class contains a prepared statement object for SQL usage.
DBUsers
This class allows the users table to be queried for login validation.
Division
This class is an object constructor used to create Division objects in the database and get/set their values.
LoginController
Controller for login screen Lambda Expression in this section was created to pass information to a log file for attempts passing or failing.
Main
This class creates the application!
MainMenuController
Main Menu Controller - This is where the journey begins!
ReportChoicesController
Reports screen Controller.
UpdateAppointmentController
The Update Appointment controller
UpdateCustomersController
 
User
This class is an object constructor used to create User objects in the database and get/set their values.
